data.text: And it came to pass, that, as he was praying in a certain place, when he ceased, one of his disciples said unto him, Lord, teach us to pray, as John also taught his disciples.
And he said unto them, When ye pray, say,
And he said unto them,
¶ And he was casting out a devil, and it was dumb. And it came to pass, when the devil was gone out, the dumb spake; and the people wondered.
But some of them said, He casteth out devils through Beelzebub the chief of the devils.
And others, tempting
But he, knowing their thoughts, said unto them,
¶ And it came to pass, as he spake these things, a certain woman of the company lifted up her voice, and said unto him, Blessed
But he said,
¶ And when the people were gathered thick together, he began to say,
¶ And as he spake, a certain Pharisee besought him to dine with him: and he went in, and sat down to meat.
And when the Pharisee saw
And the Lord said unto him,
¶ Then answered one of the lawyers, and said unto him, Master, thus saying thou reproachest us also.
And he said,
And as he said these things unto them, the scribes and the Pharisees began to urge
Laying wait for him, and seeking to catch something out of his mouth, that they might accuse him.
